content.en: Surrogate-based optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms that utilize Kriging surrogate models for global optimization in computationally intensive engineering designs. These algorithms, such as Mixed Surrogate and Space Elimination (MSSE) and improved generalized EGO (IGEGO), aim to find optimal solutions by efficiently searching through a large solution space. Additionally, other algorithms, like Multi-start Space Reduction (MSSR) and SCGOSR, use surrogate-based search and space reduction techniques for global optimization with computationally expensive black-box functions.
content.da: Surrogatbaseret optimering: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer, der anvender Kriging-surrogatmodeller til global optimering i beregningstunge ingeniørdesigns. Disse algoritmer, såsom Mixed Surrogate and Space Elimination (MSSE) og improved generalized EGO (IGEGO), sigter mod at finde optimale løsninger ved effektivt at søge gennem et stort løsningsrum. Derudover anvender andre algoritmer, som Multi-start Space Reduction (MSSR) og SCGOSR, surrogatbaseret søgning og rumreduktionsteknikker til global optimering med computermæssigt kostbare sort-boks funktioner.
